An Advertisement concerning the province of East New-Jersey in America published for the information of such as are desirous to be concerned therein, or, to transport themselves thereto. Perth, James Drummond, Earl of, 1648-1716.
22 p.
Printed by John Reid, Edinburgh : 1685.
Attributed by Wing to J.D. Perth. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
